name: Friendship Defender
description:
A goofy top down shooter about luchadors and friendship. You are Dr. Void, returning from exhile in the deepest reaches of space and time to find that his Fortress of Solitude has been taken over by the The Federation of Belligerent Writers Can you escape from the aggressive friendliness of your Arch Nemesis, El Hermano de Sementale?

Arrow keys to move

Space to shoot
